pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Saturday, June 25, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Kigali, Rwanda

Private meetings

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an intergenerational dialogue breakfast with Commonwealth youth leaders.

Kigali Convention Centre

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Leaders’ Retreat Session I.

Intare Conference Arena

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Leaders’ Retreat Session II.

Intare Conference Arena

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Leaders’ Retreat Working Luncheon.

Closed to media

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Leaders’ Retreat Session III.

Intare Conference Arena

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Leaders’ Retreat Closing Executive Session.

Intare Conference Arena

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Kigali Convention Centre

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

11:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Munich, Germany.

Kigali International Airport

Closed to media

Media appearance

3:00 p.m. (9 a.m. ET) An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CBC Radio One’s The House.
